overview: Join porn star Ettore Tosi on the road from Barcelona to Naples and discover 11 real men. 3 European countries, 3 action scenes, 6 tantalizing screen-tests.  First in a series of travelogues produced by Lucas Kazan throughout Europe, THE ROAD TO NAPLES is at heart a casting tape on-the-road. A sexy showcase of Euro muscle studs captured on camera for the first time.
title: Uno Su Mille
